mapper.insert: insert into category (name, category_type, depth_level, is_refundable, status, status_update_time) values (#{name}, #{categoryType}, #{depthLevel}, #{isRefundable}, #{status}, #{statusUpdateTime})
mapper.select: select id, name, category_type, depth_level, is_refundable, status, status_update_time from category where id = #{id}
